name: R5-CapabilityStatementKind-R4-CapabilityStatementKind
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 CapabilityStatementKind into a FHIR R4 CapabilityStatementKind

element.display: The CapabilityStatement instance represents the capabilities of a system or piece of software, independent of a particular installation.

target.display: The CapabilityStatement instance represents the capabilities of a system or piece of software, independent of a particular installation.

element.display: The CapabilityStatement instance represents the present capabilities of a specific system instance.  This is the kind returned by /metadata for a FHIR server end-point.

target.display: The CapabilityStatement instance represents the present capabilities of a specific system instance.  This is the kind returned by /metadata for a FHIR server end-point.

element.display: The CapabilityStatement instance represents a set of requirements for other systems to meet; e.g. as part of an implementation guide or 'request for proposal'.

target.display: The CapabilityStatement instance represents a set of requirements for other systems to meet; e.g. as part of an implementation guide or 'request for proposal'.
